Posts.Content: Hi, I had Surgery for removal of a tumor and 4 lymph nodes on Sept.9. Tomorrow I get the dressins removed and have a catheter inserted for MammoSite 5 day Targeted Radiation. Do you know of anyone that has had this. I like the thought of five days, twice a day, but have to say I am a little scared.
Posts.Title: Radiation treatment for breast cancer
